smb.title: Super Mario Bros.
smb.descriptionLong: Classic platformer adventure. Run, jump, and stomp your way through the Mushroom Kingdom to rescue Princess Peach.

zelda1.title: The Legend of Zelda
zelda1.descriptionLong: Epic fantasy adventure. Explore Hyrule, conquer dungeons, and collect the Triforce to defeat Ganon.

zelda2.title: Zelda II - The Adventures of Link
zelda2.descriptionLong: Epic fantasy adventure. Explore Hyrule, conquer dungeons, and collect the Triforce to defeat Ganon.

megaman2.title: Mega Man 2
megaman2.descriptionLong: Action platformer classic. Battle the Robot Masters, steal their powers, and take down Dr. Wily.

metroid.title: Metroid
metroid.descriptionLong: Sci-fi exploration adventure. Explore planet Zebes, discover power-ups, and confront Mother Brain.

contra.title: Contra
contra.descriptionLong: Run and gun action. Blast through alien forces with power-ups and iconic co-op gameplay.

castlevan1.title: Castlevania
castlevan1.descriptionLong: Gothic action platformer. Whip your way through Dracula's castle and its monstrous inhabitants.

excitebike.title: Excitebike
excitebike.descriptionLong: Motocross racing. Hit the ramps, manage engine temp, and race for the best time.

smb3.title: Super Mario Bros. 3
smb3.descriptionLong: Mario’s final NES outing. Explore world maps, use power suits, and face Bowser in diverse stages.

drmario.title: Dr. Mario
drmario.descriptionLong: Puzzle capsule matching. Stack matching colors to clear viruses in this falling-block puzzler.

kidicarus.title: Kid Icarus
kidicarus.descriptionLong: Mythic platforming adventure. Guide Pit through vertical and side-scrolling stages to save Angel Land.

goonies2.title: The Goonies II
goonies2.descriptionLong: Retro action exploration. Rescue your friends across side-view and first-person maze segments.

1942.descriptionLong: Classic vertical shooter. Pilot the P-38 Lightning and shoot down enemy squadrons over the Pacific.

1943.title: 1943: The Battle of Midway
1943.descriptionLong: Vertical shooter sequel. Battle through WWII missions with power-ups and screen-clearing specials.

arkanoid.title: Arkanoid
arkanoid.descriptionLong: Breakout-style brick breaker. Deflect the energy ball, clear stages, and snag power-ups.

castlevan3.title: Castlevania III: Dracula's Curse
castlevan3.descriptionLong: Branching gothic quest. Swap allies and fight through multiple routes to stop Dracula.

donkeykong.title: Donkey Kong
donkeykong.descriptionLong: Arcade platforming classic. Jump barrels, climb ladders, and rescue Pauline from Donkey Kong.

doubledragon.title: Double Dragon
doubledragon.descriptionLong: Co-op beat 'em up. Use martial arts and weapons to rescue Marian from the Black Warriors.

ducktales.title: DuckTales
ducktales.descriptionLong: Pogo-cane platforming. Guide Scrooge McDuck through treasure-filled stages around the globe.

galaga.title: Galaga
galaga.descriptionLong: Fixed shooter. Dodge tractor beams, rescue your captured ship, and rack up scores in challenging waves.

ghostsngoblins.title: Ghosts 'n Goblins
ghostsngoblins.descriptionLong: Brutal action platformer. Guide Arthur through deadly stages to save the princess from demonic forces.

megaman1.title: Mega Man
megaman1.descriptionLong: Robot Master origins. Defeat six bosses, copy their weapons, and take down Dr. Wily's fortress.

proam.title: R.C. Pro-Am
proam.descriptionLong: Isometric RC racing. Collect upgrades, avoid hazards, and outrace opponents in toy cars.

punchout.title: Punch-Out!!
punchout.descriptionLong: Boxing puzzle bouts. Learn opponent patterns, dodge, and counter to take Little Mac to the title.

skyshark.title: Sky Shark
skyshark.descriptionLong: Arcade shooter port. Pilot your fighter through enemy fleets with bombs and rapid-fire cannons.

tcsurf.title: T&C Surf Designs
tcsurf.descriptionLong: Surf and skate challenge. Ride waves and skate courses while racking up points and style.
